::: {.hello-quarto}

<ul class="nav nav-pills" id="doc-tabs" role="tablist">
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link active" id="hide-tab" onclick="showDocTab('hide', this)" type="button">Hide</button>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link" id="core-tab" onclick="showDocTab('core', this)" type="button">GMT Core</button>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link" id="suppl-tab" onclick="showDocTab('suppl', this)" type="button">GMT Suppl</button>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link" id="avatars-tab" onclick="showDocTab('avatars', this)" type="button">(Plot) Avatars</button>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link" id="extensions-tab" onclick="showDocTab('extensions', this)" type="button">Extensions</button>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link" id="gdal-tab" onclick="showDocTab('gdal', this)" type="button">GDAL</button>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link" id="solids-tab" onclick="showDocTab('solids', this)" type="button">Solids</button>
  </li>
  <li class="nav-item" role="presentation">
    <button class="nav-link" id="imgproc-tab" onclick="showDocTab('imgproc', this)" type="button">Img Processing</button>
  </li>
</ul>

<script>
function showDocTab(tabId, buttonElement) {
  // Hide all tab panes
  const panes = document.querySelectorAll('#doc-tabcontent > .tab-pane');
  panes.forEach(pane => {
    pane.classList.remove('active', 'show');
  });

  // Remove active from all buttons
  const buttons = document.querySelectorAll('#doc-tabs .nav-link');
  buttons.forEach(btn => {
    btn.classList.remove('active');
  });

  // Show selected pane
  const selectedPane = document.getElementById(tabId);
  if (selectedPane) {
    selectedPane.classList.add('active', 'show');
  }

  // Activate selected button
  if (buttonElement) {
    buttonElement.classList.add('active');
  }
}
</script>

<div class="tab-content" id="doc-tabcontent">

<div class="tab-pane fade show active" id="hide" role="tabpanel" aria-labelledby="hide-tab">
</div>
